N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 ยง 167.7 - Facilities

State Regulations
(a) Heating, lighting and ventilation of instructional facilities shall be conducive to
learning. (b) Fire and liability
insurance shall be provided for all facilities. (c) The buildings, rooms or space in which
staff and students are housed for any purpose while attending a school, and all
facilities and equipment therein, shall meet the standards for school purposes
of local fire, health and building authorities. Notes
